about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: Hi everyone, I'm Michelle – and a big fan of coding. You might know the quote from a crime series that says programmers are both the detective and the criminal. That perfectly captures my fascination: programming isn’t just about solving problems, it’s a thrilling investigation that challenges you and helps you grow.  I love how each project pushes me forward and opens the door to new Technologies - also as a team. If you're looking for someone who brings heart, curiosity, and a sharp mind to the table, I’d love to work together!

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: During a six-month, practice-oriented training program, I built a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I especially enjoy working with Angular, which has helped me deepen my understanding of TypeScript. Essential tools for collaboration and version control, such as GitHub and Loom, where a big part of my projects.

projects.page-description: Take a look at my project showcase featuring a variety of web apps – from business tools for communication and task management to fun and interactive games. Each project highlights different aspects of design, development, and user experience. Feel free to explore and try them out – feedback is always welcome!

dabubble.description: This App is a Slack clone App. It revolutionized team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
dabubble.details: The challenge in this project was implementing real-time communication using WebSockets and designing an intuitive user interface with a clear channel structure. My focus was on frontend architecture and the development of modular, reusable components.

join.description: A Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create an organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
join.details: I implemented drag-and-drop functionality and dynamic task rendering. The project followed an agile workflow with a modular Angular structure, allowing tasks and categories to be efficiently created, updated, and reassigned.

el-pollo-loco.description: A Jump `N Run game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe el Peligroso to fight against the crazy hen with tabasco salsa.
el-pollo-loco.details: I developed the game logic using object-oriented JavaScript. The challenge was to ensure smooth gameplay across devices by coordinating collision detection, animation timing, and sound synchronization.

pokedex.description: A responsive, browser-based Pokédex built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It fetches data from the public PokeAPI to display Pokémon cards, detailed information dialogs, and evolution chains.
pokedex.details: The app includes a searchable Pokémon database and dynamic detail views for each Pokémon. The challenge was integrating the API efficiently and building a responsive, user-friendly interface.

bestell-app.description: A food ordering application that allows users to browse menus, place orders and choose between delivery or pick-up options. The app is built with HTML, CSS & JavaScript.
bestell-app.details: In this project, the focus was on delivering a user-friendly experience and flexible menu rendering. I put a lot of effort into the interface design. The challenge was to implement the core ordering and basket logic with real-time cart updates, delivery fee calculations, item add/remove functionality, automatic price calculation, and a local storage system for order tracking.

feedback.description-one: placeholder -Your frontend projects clearly show that you place great value on user experience.
feedback.description-two: placeholder -You demonstrate strong commitment in your project work and show great creativity in finding solutions.
feedback.description-three: placeholder -You continuously expand your knowledge to keep developing your skills.

legal-notice.title: Legal Notice
legal-notice.subtitle: Information in accordance with Section 5 DDG
legal-notice.name: Name:
legal-notice.liabilityContent: The contents of my pages have been created with the utmost care. However, I cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness or topicality. As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages according to general laws pursuant to § 7(1) DDG. According to §§ 8 to 10 DDG, however, I can not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected by this. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. Upon becoming aware of such legal violations, I will remove the content immediately. The website is intended solely for non-commercial and therefore private purposes as my personal portfolio.
legal-notice.liabilityLinks: My offer contains links to external websites of third parties on whose contents I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking. However, a permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. Upon notification of violations, I will remove such links immediately.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.subtitle: Information in accordance with Section 5 DDG
privacy-policy.generalText: You can use this website without providing personal data. If you contact me via the contact form, your data (name, email address, message) will be processed solely to handle your request. This is done based on your consent in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR. The data will not be shared with third parties and will be deleted after the request has been resolved, unless legal retention obligations apply.
privacy-policy.noteTransmissionText: Please note that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., via email) may have security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of data from third-party access is not possible.
privacy-policy.spamDisclaimerText: Use of the contact details provided in the legal notice for sending unsolicited advertising or information is not permitted. As operator of the pages I reserves the right to take legal action against unsolicited advertising information, such as spam or similar abuses.
privacy-policy.toolPurpose: the tool for legal notice and
